profile.title: Purofayiri yemushandisi
profile.noPrivateKey: Hapana kiyi yakavanzika pane mudziyo uno yekuendesa.
profile.importFailed: Kutadza kuisa kiyi (password isiri iyo kana faira rakanganisika).
profile.keysRotated: Kiyi itsva yakagadzirwa uye yeruzhinji yakakwidzwa.
profile.keyDisclaimer: Kiyi yako yakavanzika haimboisiye mudziyo uno. Tumira kopi ine password kuti ugone kuiyisa pane mumwe mudziyo.
profile.themeFreeNotice: Uri paFree—shandisa sarudzo dzeZuva/Mwedzi pazasi. Kwidza kuti uvhure mamwe madingindira.
profile.backupDesc: Gadzira mabekapu ane password emakiyi ako, uye isa pane mumwe mudziyo kuti uunze pamwe.
profile.followHint: Nyaya dzavo dzinoonekwa muFollowing kana vakaburitsa kune vateveri (kana Veruzhinji).
profile.callTextForwardingDescription: Forwadha mafoni nemameseji anouya kunhamba yako kana email yakasimbiswa. Kubuda kunogona kuratidza nhamba yako yeChatforia.

chat.selectPrompt: Sarudza chinyorwa kana chat kuti utange kutaura

premium.heading: Kwidza kuPremium
premium.description: Vhura maficha ane simba & bvisa maads.

auth.headline: Kutaura kwakachengeteka, kwepasi rose nekududzira pakarepo
auth.description: Kuvharirwa-kusvika-kumagumo, kududzira kweAI, mameseji anozvibvisa, uye mafoni enzwi/vhidhiyo.

feature.privacy: Zvakavanzika kutanga. Data rako, kutonga kwako.

auth.desktopTip: Pa desktop? Scana nefoni kuti uwane app.
auth.subhead: Kutaura kwakavanzika, kwakachengetedzwa, uye kunodudzirwa — ipapo ipapo.
auth.tip: Unogona kushandisa Chatforia pane chero mudziyo — kana kudhawunirodha app kuti uwane ruzivo rwakanaka.
auth.scanHint: Scana kuti dhawunirodhe app kana kuvhura mubhrawuza.

press.title: Vatori venhau
press.contactText: Kune mibvunzo yenhau, tibate pa press@chatforia.com.
press.boilerplateText: Chatforia mushandirapamwe wakachengeteka une kududzira ipapo ipapo uye E2E encryption, wakagadzirirwa kuita hurukuro dzepasirese dzakavanzika uye dziri nyore.
press.assetsText: Malogo, ma screenshot, nemifananidzo yechigadzirwa (zviri kuuya).

careers.title: Mabasa
careers.intro: Tiri chikwata chidiki tichivaka mumeseji wepasirese ane zvakavanzika. Kana uchine hanya nekuvharirwa, kuwanikwa, neUX inofadza, tinoda kunzwa kubva kwauri.
careers.openRoles: Mabasa akavhurika: Injiniya (Full-stack, iOS, Android), Product, Rutsigiro.

about.title: Nezve Chatforia
about.description: Chatforia mumeseji anotsigira mitauro yakawanda une kuvharirwa kusvika kumagumo, kududzira ipapo ipapo, uye mafoni enzwi/vhidhiyo. Chinangwa chedu chakareruka: kubatsira vanhu kubatana—vakachengeteka, zvakavanzika, uye vachiyambuka mitauro.

values.control: Kutonga: Mameseji anozvibvisa & maread receipts zvinokwanisika kusarudzwa.

about.howDescription: Mameseji anovharirwa pamudziyo wako asati aenda. Kududzira, mabekapu, nekuunzanisa midziyo zvakagadzirwa kuderedza zvatinoona maseva edu.

advertise.title: Shambadza neChatforia
advertise.description: Svika vashandisi vekutaura vakabatikana nemafomati ane rukudzo. Tinopa mabhena enzvimbo dzinooneka, masponsorship, uye ma promos edu. Vanyori vePremium havaoni maads.

adsense.withPubId: Parizvino tinoshandisa Google AdSense. Kana uchida kutinanga kuburikidza neGoogle Ads, shandisa publisher ID {{pubId}} uye ukumbire managed placement pazvikamu zviri pazasi. Masponsorship akarurama aripo—shandisa fomu.
adsense.noPubId: Parizvino tinoshandisa Google AdSense. Masponsorship akarurama aripowo—shandisa fomu pazasi.

advertise.noPlacements: Hapana nzvimbo dzakarongwa parizvino. Wedzera mu ads/placements.js.

why.highSession: Nguva zhinji dzekushandisa uye kugara muUI yechat
why.brandSafe: Mafomati akachengeteka kuchiratidzo; kuverenga kazhinji kunodzorwa zvine ruremekedzo
why.sponsoredMoments: Nguva dzine sponsor (semuenzaniso, “Tanga Chat” modal) dziripo
why.deals: Zdeal dzakananga kana kuburikidza neAdSense/Google Ads

form.submittedMsg: Ndatenda! Kubvunza kwako kwatumirwa. Tichakutevera munguva pfupi.
form.mailtoInfo: Kuvhura email client yako kuti utumire kubvunza…

upgrade.title: Kwidza
upgrade.subtitle: Vhura chirongwa chakakunakira: bvisa maads nePlus, kana uwane maficha ese nePremium.

gettingStarted.title: Kutangira
gettingStarted.subtitle: Uri mutsva kuChatforia? Gwaro iri rinokuratidza zvakakosha kuti utange mukati memaminitsi.

alert.text: Gwaro iri richaramba richikura patichangoburitsa maficha matsva. Kana pane chashaya, tizivise kuburikidza ne

section2.title: 2) Tanga kutumira mameseji
section2.item1: Gadzira DM kana Boka uye tumira meseji yako yokutanga.
section2.item2: Shandisa kududzira ipapo ipapo kuti utaure nemitauro 100+.
section2.item3: Edza mameseji anozvibvisa uye read receipts muPurofayiri → Zvakavanzika.

section3.title: 3) Enda mberi
section3.item2Part1: Batanidza mimwe midziyo uye gadza mabekapu akavharirwa mu

account.q: Ndinogadzira kana kudzoreredza sei akaunzi rangu?
account.a: Dhawunirodha app kana shandisa pawebhu, baya “Gadzira akaunzi”, simbisa email/foni yako. Kudzorera, shandisa “Wakanganwa password”.

privacy.a: Ehe. Mameseji nemafoni anovharirwa kusvika kumagumo nekutadza. Iwe chete nemugamuchiri munogona kuaverenga.

translate.a: Batidza “Dudzira otomatiki” muZvirongwa → Chitarisiko & Mutauro. Tinodudzira pamudziyo panogoneka, kana kuburikidza nemaAPI akachengeteka ane metadata shoma.

contact.a: Tisvike pa support@chatforia.com. Sanganisira ma screenshot uye shanduro yeapp yako.

intro.body: Polisi iyi inotsanangura kuti Chatforia (“isu”) inounganidza, kushandisa, uye kugovera sei ruzivo paunoshandisa maapp edu nemasevhisi. Tinogadzira Chatforia nenzira inoderedza data ratinogona kuona.

infoWeCollect.title: Ruzivo rwatinounganidza
infoWeCollect.account: Ruzivo rwekaunzi (semuenzaniso email/foni) kugadzira neku chengetedza akaunzi rako.
infoWeCollect.encrypted: Zviri mukati zvakavharirwa (mameseji/makufona) E2E; hatigone kuzviverenga.
infoWeCollect.diagnostics: Zvekudzokorora/kushandiswa senge crash logs, rudzi rwemudziyo, kana analytics shoma kuvandudza kuita.

howWeUse.title: Maitiro atinoshandisa ruzivo
howWeUse.provide: Kupa neku chengetedza sevhisi (auth, kudzivirira spam/kushungurudza).

sharing.title: Kugovera
sharing.body: Hatitengesi data remunhu. Tinogona kugovera data shoma nevanobatsira (semuenzaniso push notifications, analytics) pasi pezvibvumirano zvakasimba.

rights.title: Kodzero dzako
rights.body: Zvichienderana nenzvimbo yako (semuenzaniso GDPR/UK GDPR/CPRA), unogona kukumbira kuwana, kugadzirisa, kubvisa, kana kusabvumira mimwe mishandirapamwe. Taura: privacy@chatforia.com.

retention.title: Kuchengetwa kwedata & chengetedzo
retention.body: Tinongachengeta zvinodikanwa kuti sevhisi ishande uye tinoshandisa maitiro akajairwa ekuchengetedza. Zviri muE2E hazvigone kuvhurwa nesu.

children.title: Vana
children.body: Chatforia haitarisirwi kuvana vari pasi pe13 (kana sezvinodiwa nemutemo wenyu).

changes.title: Shanduko
changes.body: Tichaburitsa zvigadziridzo pano uye togadzirisa zuva re“Yakagadziridzwa kwekupedzisira”.

intro.body: Nekushandisa Chatforia unobvuma Mitemo iyi. Kana usingabvumi, usashandise sevhisi.

accounts.title: Maakaunzi
accounts.itemAccurateInfo: Ipa ruzivo rwakarurama uye chengeta makiyi ako akachengeteka.
accounts.itemResponsibility: Iwe une mutoro wezviri kuitika paakaunzi rako.

acceptableUse.title: Kushandiswa kunogamuchirika
acceptableUse.itemNoAbuse: Hapana zvisiri pamutemo, zvechisimba, kana zvinotyora kodzero; hapana spam kana kushungurudza kwakangofambiswa otomatiki.
acceptableUse.itemSuspend: Tinogona kumisa/kumisa zvachose kana pakaitika kutyora.

yourContent.title: Zviri mukati zvako
yourContent.body: Unoramba uine kodzero yezviri mukati zvako. Unotipa kodzero dzinodiwa kuti sevhisi ishande (semuenzaniso, kufambisa, kuchengetedza, kududzira).

disclaimer.title: Zvirambidzo & mutoro
disclaimer.body: Sevhisi inopihwa “zvazviri” pasina vimbiso. Chero bedzi mutemo uchibvumira, Chatforia haipindi mhosva kumigumisiro isiri yakananga kana yekutevera.

changes.title: Shanduko
changes.body: Tinogona kugadzirisa mitemo iyi; kuenderera mberi uchishandisa mushure me shanduko zvinoreva kubvuma.

doNotSell.title: Usatengese kana Kugovera Ruzivo Rwangu Rwega
doNotSell.body: Chatforia haitengesi ruzivo rwega. Vagari veCalifornia vachiri kukwanisa kuendesa zvikumbiro pasi peCPRA vachishandisa bhatani riri pazasi.

cookies.title: Zvirongwa zveCookie
cookies.body: Chatforia inoshandisa ma cookie mashoma (semuenzaniso, session, chengetedzo). Hatishandisi ma cookie eads emapato echitatu. Tarisira ma cookie kuburikidza nezvirongwa zebhrawuza rako.
